name: Ball (rpgvideo)
description:
Description

Ball: just a ball stuck in levels full of traps. Will you be able to complete all the levels before time's up? Find out in this terrific platform!

Features

Steam Trading Cards
Timed Levels
Colourful graphics
Challenging levels

System requirements

OS: Windows XP-7-10
Pentium 200 Ghz
10 MB Space HD
32 MB RAM
DirectX 9.0

Ball is created by Camagames and is published by RPGVideo and will be priced at $1

[IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/b5h5vs.png[/IMG]
www.rpgstudios.co.uk
